text: The 1991 Sovran Bank Classic was a men's tennis tournament played on outdoor hard courts at the William H.G. FitzGerald Tennis Center in Washington, D.C. in the United States that was part of the Championship Series of the 1991 ATP Tour. It was the 23rd edition of the tournament was held from July 15 through July 21, 1991. First-seeded Andre Agassi won his second consecutive singles title at the event. ==Finals== ===Singles=== Andre Agassi defeated Petr Korda 6–3, 6–4 * It was Agassi's second singles title of the year and the 14th of his career. ===Doubles=== Scott Davis / David Pate defeated Ken Flach / Robert Seguso 6–4, 6–2 ==References== ==External links== * Official website * ATP tournament profile Sovran Bank Classic Category:Washington Open (tennis) Category:1991 in sports in Washington, D.C. Category:1991 in American tennis
title: 1991 Sovran Bank Classic
